actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Environment and Public Works (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 95-650.

official_title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works, for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 95-650) Authorizes additional expenditures, not to exceed $1,386,200, by the Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works for inquiries and investigations.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works, for inquiries and investigations.
